subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: James Hinchcliffe cruised to victory at the inaugural Indy Grand Prix of Louisiana in Avondale, pitting only once and spending much of his day leading the field under a full-course yellow flag.
snippet: James Hinchcliffe cruised to victory at the inaugural Indy Grand Prix of Louisiana in Avondale, pitting only once and spending much of his day leading the field under a full-course yellow flag.
